date: Tue Feb 01 2022 20:13:51 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: Sony announced the purchase of Bungie, which is by far its largest acquisition of video game studios in the past decade. Microsoft is committed to releasing at least the next three Call of Duty games on Sony's PlayStation. Sony made clear that Destiny 2 and other titles won't go solely to PlayStation platforms. Sony shares were up as much as 2.6 per cent in Tokyo in Tuesday morning trading.
metaDescription: See this AI generated artwork about the purchase of Bungie by Microsoft, which is by far its largest acquisition of video game studios in the past decade.
